description: Details pursuant to ref: 20/01815/FUL for existing and proposed ground levels (5) in respect of demolition of the existing buildings to provide three buildings comprising residential dwellings (Class C3), new pedestrian link to Mollison Avenue, associated landscaping, car parking and amenity space. Existing Site Topographical Survey (Dwg.TS19-048-1-2D TS19-048-1)Proposed Landscape Plan (Dwg.GAE-ULA-00-00-DR-L-1000-P1-A1 Landscape)Proposed Landscape Levels Plan (Dwg.GAE-ULA-00-00-DR-L-1150-P1-A1 Landscape)Proposed Hard Landscape Plan (Dwg.GAE-ULA-00-00-DR-L-1250-P1-A1 Landscape)Proposed Landscape Sections (Dwg.GAE-ULA-00-00-DR-L-2000-P1-A1 Landscape)
application_type_full: Approval of details reserved by a condition (discharge)
